title: Personal functions to make life easier
code: as_tibble(mtcars) |>    summaryx(mpg) |>    glimpse() #> Rows: 1 #> Columns: 21 #> $ min      <dbl> 10.4 #> $ p1       <dbl> 10.4 #> $ p5       <dbl> 11.995 #> $ p10      <dbl> 14.34 #> $ p25      <dbl> 15.425 #> $ median   <dbl> 19.2 #> $ p75      <dbl> 22.8 #> $ p90      <dbl> 30.09 #> $ p95      <dbl> 31.3 #> $ p99      <dbl> 33.435 #> $ max      <dbl> 33.9 #> $ n_obs    <int> 32 #> $ sum      <dbl> 642.9 #> $ mean     <dbl> 20.09062 #> $ sd       <dbl> 6.026948 #> $ lci_95   <dbl> 8.278024 #> $ uci_95   <dbl> 31.90323 #> $ n_miss   <int> 0 #> $ n_zero   <int> 0 #> $ pct_miss <dbl> 0 #> $ pct_zero <dbl> 0 dplyr::as_tibble(mtcars) |>    group_by(cyl) |>    summaryx(mpg) |>    select(cyl, min, max, mean) #> # A tibble: 3 × 4 #>     cyl   min   max  mean #>   <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> #> 1     4  21.4  33.9  26.7 #> 2     6  17.8  21.4  19.7 #> 3     8  10.4  19.2  15.1
